alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 12:52PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Lauderdale and central Colbert Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1251 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Walnut Grove to near Iuka. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Cherokee, St. Florian, Underwood-Petersville, Waterloo, Northwest Alabama Regional Airport and Riverton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northwestern Alabama.
